title: Remove last remnant of old Admin UI
description:
In SOLR-10042 we removed the old jQuery based Admin UI and got rid of the non-working copy-to-clipboard feature. This issue is to remove the unused file zeroclipboard.swf from the UI.

Thanks to Heiko Heilemann of MEKO-S GmbH for making us aware of this file!

comments.content:
Removed in 259a3df8a77b4caec7ede665fbc1775024c91f6d (master), 7ba376cbcd58176e8625229af35e0e568d036024 (7x) and e4e7e9eb1dd4ee31fc3a8acd4f58c2f39224477c (7.2.x)

Still needs a CHANGES entry for 7.3
comments.author: Jan Høydahl
